headline: Got $5,000? 2 Top Growth Stocks to Buy That Could Double Your Money.
summary: If you have extra cash you don't need for paying bills or reducing debt, investing in companies serving the growing data center market could pay off in the next five years.  To handle greater AI workloads, data centers require more memory and storage capacity.  Micron Technology (NASDAQ: MU) is one of the leading suppliers of high-performance dynamic random access memory (DRAM) and non-volatile memory (NAND) products, which positions it well for this opportunity.
